subject: Federal Reserve Bank New Yor
body:
Federal Reserve Bank New York
 33, Liberty Street, New York, NY 10038 USA.
Ref.: Final Payment Release Update.
Telephone; 1-917-810-9765
Amount Valued: US$$10,499,999.89.
Attention: 
This is to remind you that your funds are still floating in our Online Banking computer database system here in the Federal Reserve Bank New-York, and we are still waiting for your compliance in sending the required $550 Transfer Reflection Permission Clearance fees, to enable the authorities to permit your attempted outgoing fund transfers to automatically start reflecting into your designated bank account now.
Please be informed that we are mandated by the authorities to conclude this payment assignment on/before 12/9/23 and once this mandate expires, every outstanding monetary transaction would be cancelled and be moved to the government treasury account as unclaimed money.
 
So on that note, you are advised to comply urgently in making the required payment now so we could conclude this subject matter in a timely manner, hence to avoid the authorities cancelling your approved fund and moving the funds to government coffers.
 
Note, this is the only financial obligation you are to offset to get your fund released to you now, hence other modalities have already been concluded here in our computer database.
 Now we have notified the American Bankers Association and other concerned monetary authorities here in the United States on the present status of your fund release, and they would stand as a witness to us if your payment eventually gets cancelled due to your delay or non compliance to our directives in sending the required fee.
 
So we implore you to kindly comply urgently in sending the required fee now to enable us to conclude this matter before things go beyond control here.
 
Your urgent compliance to our advise would enable us to serve you with the best of our professional services,
 Thanks, in anticipation of your cooperation,
Yours sincerely,
Mr. James Howard,
Director, Remittance Dept.
Federal Reserve Bank, New-York

subject: Re:   Federal Reserve Bank New Yor
body:
Hello Mr. James Howard,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information about my funds. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear that there are funds floating in the Federal Reserve Bank's Online Banking computer database system under my name.

Could you please provide more details on how these funds ended up in your system? Also, could you clarify what the Transfer Reflection Permission Clearance fees are and why they are necessary?

I'm also curious about the mandate by the "to conclude this payment assignment". Could you elaborate more on who has issued this mandate and why it is set to expire soon?

Lastly, I would appreciate if you could explain a bit more about the process of moving unclaimed money to the government treasury account. Is this a common practice?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carl
